name: Lost Shadows
description:
***************NOTE******************REQUIRES XBOX CONTROLLER!!!!

Capstone Project (14 weeks)

Lost Shadows is a 3D third person single player adventure/puzzle/horror game set in an abandoned amusement park. The player must avoid the light at all cost to escape the park safely. Dark shadow enemies follow the player through the park and can only be seen in the light. Equipped with only a flashlight, the player must bend the light to their own will using flashlight filters shaped as scissors to cut, electricity to power and gear to move objects.

Will you escape the park?

Features:

Here are some of the defining pillars of gameplay for Lost Shadows.

Beware of the Light:

Shadowy enemies that chase the player when they walk through the light

Solve Puzzles:

Progress through the game by bending light to turn off or move rides and lights.

Collect Information:

Explore the park to find information on why it is abandoned.

Our Team:

Designers: Katie Phillips, Shyam Sreenivasan

Artists: Yufan Li, Katie Phillips, Shyam Sreenivasan

Programmers: Rion Meehan, Freed Ahmad

Sound Designer: PJ Tremblay

Minimum requirements:

4GB RAM

2GB Graphic Card (Nvidia GTX 780 or higher)

2GB of free space

We would love to get feedback from the players! Thanks for playing Lost Shadows.
